Bob Chapman
===========

[City Council](http://www.keenetx.com/Directory.aspx?DID=14)  
Title: Council Member, Place III  
Phone: [817-641-3336 Ext. 105](tel:8176413336;105)
  
Additional Phone: [720-244-7184](tel:7202447184)  
[Email Council Member Chapman](mailto:bchapman@keenetx.com)
